text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @PressSec Is @SpeakerPelosi working for the United States Congress or is she working for the Chinese or “World” Congress???

We need #covid19 #PaycheckProtectionProgram funds! Nancy Pelosi should start working for the American people! Now!
